item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-01
item.description: ‘It will change everything’: DeepMind’s AI makes gigantic leap in solving protein structures (8 minute read) DeepMind’s AlphaFold can determine a protein’s 3D shape using its amino-acid sequence.
